page.title: List of photographs by Edward Weston

revisions.rev:
The artistic career of '''[[Edward Weston]]''' spanned more than forty years, from roughly 1915 to 1956. A prolific photographer, he produced more than 1,000 black-and-white photographs and some 50 color images. This list is an incomplete selection of Weston's better-known photographs. {| class="wikitable" border="0" style="background:#ffffff" class="sortable wikitable" |+ align="center"
